meanings.definition: To remove the reproductive organs of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian will be desexing the cat tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Many pet owners choose desexing to prevent unwanted litters.
meanings.sent3: After desexing the dog, it became calmer and more relaxed.
meanings.sent4: Desexing the rabbit was like taking away its ability to create baby bunnies.
meanings.sent5: The desexing procedure is important for controlling the pet population.

meanings.definition: The act of neutering or spaying an animal.
meanings.sent1: Desexing is a common practice in animal shelters.
meanings.sent2: The desexing of stray cats helps reduce overpopulation.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a skit about the adventures of a desexing clinic.
meanings.sent4: In the world of animal welfare, desexing is a crucial step in responsible pet ownership.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of desexing include improved health and behavior in pets.
